pages.title: Overview
pages.purpose: Introduce the Semantic News platform, explaining its purpose as an AI-powered news aggregation and analysis system with semantic search capabilities

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.purpose: Guide users through initial setup, configuration, and running the application locally

pages.title: Installation and Dependencies
pages.purpose: Detail the required dependencies, Python packages, and external services (PostgreSQL with pgvector, Redis, OpenAI API)

pages.title: Configuration and Environment Variables
pages.purpose: Explain environment-based configuration, .env file setup, and settings module structure

pages.title: Core Architecture
pages.purpose: Explain the overall system architecture, including Django structure, Celery integration, and database design

pages.title: URL Routing and Views
pages.purpose: Document the URL structure, routing patterns, and how views are organized across the application

pages.title: User Management and Profiles
pages.purpose: Explain user authentication, profile system, and content visibility permissions

pages.title: Asynchronous Task Processing
pages.purpose: Document the Celery setup, task queuing, and background job processing for AI operations

pages.title: Topics System
pages.purpose: Introduce the Topics system as the core content aggregation feature, explaining how topics serve as containers for curated information

pages.title: Topic Lifecycle and Management
pages.purpose: Document topic creation, editing, status transitions (draft/published/archived), and publication snapshots

pages.title: Topic Layout System
pages.purpose: Explain the dynamic module layout system, MODULE_REGISTRY, drag-and-drop editing, and placement management

pages.title: Topic Modules Overview
pages.purpose: Provide an overview of the nine topic module types and how they extend topic functionality

pages.title: Recaps and Text Modules
pages.purpose: Document AI-generated recap creation and custom text block functionality

pages.title: Data Module - Upload and Storage
pages.purpose: Explain tabular data fetching from URLs, search-based data discovery, and data storage

pages.title: Data Module - Analysis and Visualization
pages.purpose: Document AI-powered data analysis, insight generation, and Chart.js visualization creation

pages.title: Images and Cover Generation
pages.purpose: Document AI-powered cover image generation with DALL-E and image management

pages.title: Timeline and Event Integration
pages.purpose: Explain how events are associated with topics, AI event suggestions, and timeline visualization

pages.title: Entity Relations Module
pages.purpose: Document AI extraction of entity relationships and relation graph visualization

pages.title: Embeds and Media Modules
pages.purpose: Explain YouTube video integration, tweet embedding, and other external media types

pages.title: Topic API Reference
pages.purpose: Provide comprehensive API endpoint documentation for topic operations

pages.title: Events System (Agenda)
pages.purpose: Introduce the Events system for managing factual occurrences with semantic deduplication

pages.title: Event Model and Semantic Search
pages.purpose: Document the Event model structure, embedding generation, and vector similarity queries

pages.title: Event Creation and Validation
pages.purpose: Explain event creation workflow, AI validation, semantic deduplication, and the EventManager

pages.title: Event Discovery and Suggestions
pages.purpose: Document AI-powered event suggestion system, web search integration, and find_major_events functionality

pages.title: Event Display and Timeline Views
pages.purpose: Explain event listing views, detail pages, filtering by category/domain, and similar events display

pages.title: Event Categories, Sources, and Localities
pages.purpose: Document the category system, source tracking, and locality-based filtering

pages.title: Event API Reference
pages.purpose: Provide comprehensive API endpoint documentation for event operations

pages.title: AI Integration and Semantic Search
pages.purpose: Explain how OpenAI is integrated throughout the system for embeddings, content generation, and validation

pages.title: Vector Embeddings and Similarity Search
pages.purpose: Document embedding generation, pgvector usage, L2Distance and CosineDistance queries, and HNSW indexing

pages.title: AI Content Generation
pages.purpose: Explain structured output parsing, prompt engineering, and the various AI generation endpoints
